text: There are a lot of yakatabune coming, huh?

Yeah, it really seems like
there's some kind of festival going on.
Right now... it's cherry blossom season, so...

From the boats...
they must be enjoying cherry blossom viewing, right...?

That's probably it! How elegant...!
Viewing cherry blossoms from a boat must be amazing.

Surely...
they're also enjoying delicious food...

Ahaha
It's like a dream boat, isn't it...!
Though we can't ride the boat...

If there's a place along the river with beautiful cherry
blossoms, shall we go check it out?
